No one expects Bluray quality, but is it watchable? 

There's no point in ruining a potentially great movie trying to understand bad audio, or if parts are missing, etc. The 36 secs at the start doesn't sound like a killer, if that's all that's missing. Thx.
Thanx for the upload. v6/a6 good work.

"good work"?? What are you, some kinda moron?

Both this *and* the UnKnOwN release use the same video source (or else it's very similar)--it has horrible, pulsating flicker in most of the bright scenes (of which there are many since this is set in Alaska). TOTALLY UNWATCHABLE unless you are really desperate. 

Hey INSPiRAL, UnKnOwN, and .BONE: You need to have sharp objects shoved up your rectums for releasing this crap. Thanks.

How fucking rude! Clearly states 'TS', what did you expect?! Yeah you might not like CAMS or TS' but there are plenty of people out there, myself included, who really aren't that bothered. Since we watch them in a small window on our laptops whilst doing other stuff on the web. It's about the freedom to choose, do I DL the shitter copy now? Fuck off if you don't like it and go and pay for your shit!
